projects.title: LLM-driven Molecular Structure Elucidation
projects.description: Developing novel Large Language Models to predict molecular structures from mass spectrometry data using chain-of-thought reasoning. Implementing multi-stage training architecture (SFT, Reward Modeling, RL) inspired by state-of-the-art LLMs like DeepSeek-R1.
projects.technologies: Large Language Models, Reinforcement Learning, Chain of Thought, Molecular Design

projects.title: Multi-modal LLM for Materials Informatics
projects.description: Fine-tuned and combined YOLOv8 and LLAMA3 model backbonesto extract molecular information from scientific literature and predict electrochemical properties using Graph Neural Networks. Achieved RÂ² coefficient exceeding 99.1% in property prediction.
projects.technologies: Multi-modal LLMs, YOLOv8, LLAMA3, Graph Neural Networks, DFT

projects.title: Variational Transformer for Quantum Systems
projects.description: Proposed and developed a novel transformer density operator ansatz to efficiently model steady states of dissipative quantum systems. Validated on dissipative Ising model with high accuracy.
projects.technologies: Transformer Architecture, Quantum Computing, Variational Methods

projects.title: Diffusion Models for X-ray Spectroscopy
projects.description: Constructed extensive database of X-ray Absorption Spectra and protein structures. Developing diffusion model-based multi-modal approach to reconstruct protein structures from XAS spectra.
projects.technologies: Diffusion Models, Computer Vision, Graph Neural Networks, X-ray Spectroscopy

projects.title: AI-enabled Cardiac MRI Interpretation
projects.description: Developed large vision model-based deep learning pipelines for heart disease diagnosis. Achieved over 99% accuracy in cardiac anomaly detection, surpassing human performance benchmarks.
projects.technologies: Computer Vision, Deep Learning, Medical Imaging, Large Vision Models
